scripts.build:bundle: npm-run-all clean build && mkdirp ./bundle && cp -a .env package.json dist/* bundle && sed -i '' 's/dist\/scrape.js/scrape.js/g' bundle/package.json
scripts.deploy: yarn run build:bundle && source .env && gcloud functions deploy statusScrape --source bundle --runtime nodejs8 --trigger-http --timeout=120 --project $GC_PROJECT
scripts.deploy:emulator: yarn run build:bundle && source .env && functions-emulator deploy statusScrape -H --source bundle --timeout=120 --project $GC_PROJECT
